Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (7/24/2011 7:46:42 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Elephants are cool in real life. In Magic, that's not so much the case. This can tap for a mana the turn it comes down, and can regenerate your [Chameleon Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chameleon Colossus), so it's not that bad. I'd just have a hard time rationalizing spending ~ 25 bucks on a land that's merely "not that bad."
